snippet: Derek Stepan broke a 2-2 tie late in the third period to lift the Rangers, but they again lost McDonagh, their captain, who was elbowed in the head by Toronto’s Leo Komarov.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Toronto Maple Leafs, 4-2; other professional hockey news and scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Derek Stepan broke a 2-2 tie late in the third period to lift the Rangers, but they again lost McDonagh, their captain, who was elbowed in the head by Toronto’s Leo Komarov.

headline.print_headline: Rangers Stop Leafs, but McDonagh Exits After Hit to Head
headline.main: Rangers Stop Leafs, but McDonagh Exits After Hit to Head
